title: Android 13 could significantly reduce game loading times
content:
With Android 12, Google introduced several new features for mobile gamers and developers to take the Android gaming experience to the next level. Select smartphones, such as the Pixel 6 series, have a new Game Dashboard utility, which provides access to useful tools like a screenshot shortcut, a screen recorder, a DND toggle, and more

The post Android 13 could significantly reduce game loading times appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 adds a new method called setGameState to the GameManager API, allowing games to communicate their current state to the system.
